name: mongodb
description: Commands: -> show dbs: this command shows all the databases present -> use <database-name>: this command selects a partcular db -> db.<collection-name>: this commands creates a new collection in the db -> db.<collection-name>.insertOne({}): this commnad insert one object into the collection -> db.<collection-name>.insertMany({}, {}): this command inserts many objects into the collection -> db.<collection-name>.find(): this command will return the first 20 datasets/objects into the collection
